meanings.definition: The skin of a sheep with the wool still attached.
meanings.sent1: The farmer collected sheepskins after shearing his flock.
meanings.sent2: The cozy blanket was made of soft sheepskins.
meanings.sent3: At the sheep-themed party, guests wore sheepskins as capes.
meanings.sent4: The field looked like a sea of sheepskins under the sun.
meanings.sent5: The baby fell asleep on the fluffy sheepskins.

meanings.definition: A diploma or certificate made of sheepskin.
meanings.sent1: The university awarded him a sheepskins for his academic achievements.
meanings.sent2: She proudly displayed her sheepskins on the wall.
meanings.sent3: The sheepskins on the wall seemed to cheer him on as he studied.
meanings.sent4: His sheepskins opened doors to new opportunities.
meanings.sent5: The sheepskins symbolized years of hard work and dedication.

meanings.definition: A type of leather made from the skin of a sheep.
meanings.sent1: The fashion designer used sheepskins to create stylish jackets.
meanings.sent2: The gloves were lined with soft sheepskins for warmth.
meanings.sent3: The sheepskins were so smooth that they felt like silk.
meanings.sent4: Her boots were made of luxurious sheepskins.
meanings.sent5: The scent of new sheepskins filled the room.
